2174.subject: SPED
2174.course_title_long: Adv Assessment/Curriculum for Children w Learning Challenges
2174.descrlong: Candidates demonstrate the ability to adapt general ed curric; use and eval a variety of group instruct strat; analyze student perform. data; and design, implement, and evaluate an instructional unit with sequences for effective teaching of concepts, rules, and strategies in any area. Each candidate demonstrates knowledge and skills in validated practices that maximize academic learning time, teacher-directed instruction, student success, and content coverage.  Online, hybrid and face to face.
